caption.p: Analysis of virus binding and viral growth in A549-Dual™. In ( a) and ( b), for virus binding assays, cells were incubated with viral clones at the MOI of 1 for 1 h at 4 °C. The number of virus particles bound to cell surface was measured by RT-qPCR. Values represent means and standard errors of three independent experiments. In ( c) and ( d), A549-Dual™ were infected with BR15 E-MUT and MR766 E-MUT at MOI of 1. Infectious virus released into the supernatants of infected A549-Dual™ cells were quantified at 24, 48 and 72 hpi. Error bars represent standard errors of at least two independent experiments. In ( e) and ( f), A549-Dual™ were infected with BR15 E-MUT and MR766 E-MUT and parental clones at MOI of 1. Percentages of ZIKV-infected cells were determined at 48 h by flow cytometry using anti-E mAb 4G2 as primary antibody. Error bars represent standard errors of two independent experiments in duplicates. ns: not significant, ***: p value < 0.001
